title: LaporinAja
description: A public complaint platform with encrypted identities and a reward-based reporting system.
details: LaporinAja is a civic-tech web application that allows users to report public facility issues securely with encrypted identities. The system includes categorized reports, image uploads, admin verification, and a point-based reward mechanism to encourage community participation and transparency.

title: Pemilos Stemba 2025
description: A web-based voting system for the 2025 OSIS Chairperson and Vice Chairperson election.
details: A digital election platform developed for SMK Negeri 7 Semarang to manage the 2025 OSIS election process. It features candidate profiles, secure authentication, one-time voting validation, and real-time vote counting to ensure transparency and efficiency.

title: DevShare
description: A developer community platform for sharing articles, learning, and connecting.
details: DevShare is a full-stack community platform where developers can publish technical articles, interact through comments, and build connections. It includes user authentication, profile management, and a structured content system to support collaborative learning.

title: Inventrack
description: A web application for warehouse inventory management with item tracking and reporting features.
details: Inventrack is a web platform for warehouse inventory management that helps users track and organize items, monitor stock levels, and streamline warehouse operations. The system provides an easy-to-use interface for managing inventory efficiently and supports businesses in keeping their stock accurate and well-organized.

title: Sipjako
description: A system for managing and monitoring empty class hours efficiently.
details: Sipjako is a scheduling management system designed to track and manage empty class hours in school. It provides role-based access, reporting features, and structured data management to improve academic coordination and monitoring.

title: Cineview
description: A movie and series rating platform with reviews and AI-based recommendations.
details: Cineview is a movie and TV series rating website inspired by IMDb, allowing users to browse content, leave reviews, and interact through comments. It also integrates an AI-powered chatbot that provides personalized movie and series recommendations.
